first-launch-disclaimer-content: Pay attention! It takes One Click to open up a trade. Without a confirmation.
trading-session-closed-info-1: Stock markets are closed on weekends.
trading-session-closed-info-2: Trading on our platform is available from 03:00 Monday till 00:00 Friday.
trading-session-closed-info-3: Market data provided by Thompson Reuters.
fill-profile-to-continue: To continue your work on the platform, please, provide additional information
personal-data-safety: Safety of personal data is guaranteed
cannot-buy-option-try-later: Unable to open this trade, please try again later.
max-total-bet-limit-exceeded:
You have exceeded allowed trade amount.
 Allowed trade amount is {{@maxBet}}
hint-activate-tment-wallet: Press here to start using the contest account
banner-tech-works-info-content:
We always work to improve our trading platform.
 At the moment platform is being updated.
 We are sorry for any inconvenience.
confirm-email-content: Please confirm your email address. Click the button below to resend an email with a confirmation link.
banner-not-enough-funds-for-tment: You have insufficient funds on your account. Please top up your account to participate in the contest.
swipe-up-to-enter-fs: Swipe up to enter fullscreen mode
reg-request-message: If you would have traded on our website, you could have earned {{@income}} by now. Don’t lose any more time, start trading!
trade-without-restrictions-message: If you wish to open more than 5 trades at once, open a real trading account and trade with no limits. To keep using demo account, please wait for your current deals to expire.
error-sending-email-confirmation: An error occurred while sending mail. Please try again later.
deposit-using-agreements-p1: Bonus is additional funds that are provided by the company to increase the trading potential of traders.
deposit-using-agreements-p2: When making a deposit, a certain amount of bonus money may be credited to your account, size of bonus depends on the size of your deposit.
deposit-using-agreements-p3: The bonus does not limit the withdrawal of funds - you can withdraw profit, as well as the amount of your deposit, at any time.
deposit-user-sum-value-caption: Want to pick up you own amount? Use the input field
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-header: How can I withdraw funds from my account?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-content: Available options are: bank card, Qiwi/Yandex Money/WebMoney e-wallets. Owners of micro accounts can have only one active application for withdrawal of funds.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-header: What is the minimum amount of money that can be withdrawn from the account?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-content: You can withdraw money starting from 300 rubles or 5$ / 5€.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-header: Is there a fee for replenishing/withdrawing cash from the account?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-content: We do not charge any commission, as well as fees for payments. However, some percentage in the form of a commission can be charged by your payment system.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-header: How's quick the withdrawal of funds?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-a: It depends on the type of account and system you use to withdraw funds. After the application is submitted by the trader, the company must approve it. As soon as the company approves the application, the funds are written off from your account. Holders of "Business" accounts and higher can expect the processing of their applications within 24 hours, applications of all other customers are processed within 3 working days.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-b: If you're using different eWallets, you will receive money within 24 hours after approval of the application by the company. The transfer of funds to a bank card may take up to several business days, depending on the bank/credit card issuer.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-a: The company withdraws funds to the same requisites of the same payment system from which the deposit was made. If such a transaction is not possible, you need to contact customer support via online chat or by sending a request to support@binarium.com.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-b: Компания выводит средства на те же реквизиты той же платежной системы, с которых было выполнено пополнение счета. Если такую транзакцию провести нет возможности, нужно обратиться в техподдержку через онлайн чат либо отправив запрос на support@binarium.com.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-header: Do I need to provide documents when I withdraw funds? If yes, which ones?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-a: Upon your first withdrawal, you have to provide personal and passport information. If you use several credit cards or payment details do not coincide with those you specified during registration, you will need to go through full authorization process and prove that the cards actually belong to you. The withdrawal of funds for third parties is prohibited.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-b: To do this, send a scan of the passport and bank card (the front side) to support@binarium.com so that the name and surname of the owner can be seen. If you own not an embossed card, then in addition to the copy of the passport you must send a scan of the bank statement, with the transaction from this card to your Binarium account. The company reserves the right to require additional supporting documents in case the data of the cardholder and the trading account do not coincide.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-header: On what conditions is it possible to withdraw bonus funds?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-a: The bonus itself can not be withdrawn immediately after it has been accrued, broker gives this money as an addition to your deposit to increase your trading opportunities. Money earned with bonus funds is also a bonus and is available for withdrawal only after the necessary trade turnover is achieved. To withdraw the bonus itself, you need to achieve x40 turnover of the amount of the bonus on the account. If you were given a no deposit bonus, then the leverage is increased to 50, that is, the turnover on the account should be equal to the bonus x50 and the maximum amount of withdrawal can not exceed the amount of added no deposit bonus. Cash prizes from free contests of the company are bonus, which are available for withdrawal after achieving a x40 turnover.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-b: Example. When you've made a deposit, you accrued $ 150 as a bonus. According to the rules, it is necessary that the total value of the purchased options is 30 x 150 = $ 4500. After this value is achieved, you can withdraw the bonus funds. In this case, both profitable and unprofitable transactions are taken into account. Early terminated deals are not included in the turnover. There are no restrictions on the withdrawal of profits.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-c: If you are going to withdraw the part of the deposit, then the bonus is automatically deducted from your account.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-d: Any points that remain unclear can be clarified by the Binarium customer support.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-header: I can't create an application for withdrawal of funds from the account. What can be wrong?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-content: First, check whether all of the personal information is listed on your profile, to check it go to the "Profile" section. Once again, make sure that you entered all the information correctly when submitting the application, the symbols like +, -, / etc are invalid. If all the information entered is correct, but the problem persists, please, contact customer support via online chat or at support@binarium.com.
withdrawal-request-sent: The request is placed in the queue
withdrawal-request-sent-extra-info: The status of the request can be tracked in the “Transaction history” section”
cashbox-withdrawal-info: На обработку заявки потребуется некоторое время. Обратите внимание, мы не замораживаем баланс до момента выплаты, чтобы Вы могли продолжить торговлю
expiration-caption-15: At the end of the day
what-are-trends-advice-content: Trends are a special trading tool that allows you to quickly find an asset with a pronounced price direction and open a trade in the direction of the trend.
not-enough-money-for-trends-detailed: A unique trading tool from Binarium is available for customers with a real balance over {{@balance}}. The trends`s section opens the following possibilities:
trends-features-one: Tracking all active trends in the market at the moment
trends-features-two: Immediate opening of the trade in the direction of the trend movement
